DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Deathknight when:

  • Pillar of Frost is active or the Deathknight does not talented Pillar of Frost, and any of these conditions are met:
  • They talented Obliteration (regardless of other cooldowns)
  • They talented Breath of Sindragosa and its effect is active
  • They do not have Obliteration nor Breath of Sindragosa talented
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Deathknight when:

  • The Deathknight is in a single-target phase or fighting priority adds while their Gargoyle is active with ≤22 seconds remaining.
  • They use Army of the Dead talent alongside Raise Abomination (with Abomination active & ≤18s remaining) or Army Ghouls (with ≤18s remaining).
  • They have Dark Transformation active and aren’t using Gargoyle or Army of the Dead talents.
  • Gargoyle isn’t active yet, and its cooldown won’t align with Power Infusion’s duration.
  • There are 3+ enemies with Dark Transformation active or Death and Decay areas active.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • The Demon Hunter has Metamorphosis active, maximizing their damage output during this powerful cooldown.
  • The encounter is within the final 20 seconds, ensuring the buff’s full duration is utilized before the fight ends.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • Their Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune cooldown is active, enhancing their burst window.
  • They are able to cast spells without movement interruptions.
  • They have an Empowerment buff (Solar or Lunar) active, ensuring optimal damage output.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • Bloodlust/Heroism is active during their rotation (synced with raid buffs), or
  • The Druid has not selected the Berserk: Heart of the Lion talent (prioritizing PI as an alternative damage boost)
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • Dragonrage is active, and either: their Shattering Star is on cooldown, the target has the Shattering Star debuff, or there are 2+ enemies.
  • The encounter will end in under 35 seconds to ensure full cooldown utilization.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • The hunter's Trueshot buff has more than 12 seconds remaining, ensuring maximum synergy with their cooldown window.
  • The encounter is within the final 13 seconds, allowing Power Infusion to be fully utilized before the fight ends.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • The hunter has Coordinated Assault active.
  • Spearhead is on cooldown and the hunter does NOT have Coordinated Assault talented.
  • The hunter has neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talented.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage is not equipped with Spymaster's Web and has just cast Arcane Surge.
  • The Mage is equipped with Spymaster's Web and has just cast Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • The Mage is preparing to cast Combustion and has no active Power Infusion buff.
  • Combustion is already active and has more than 7 seconds remaining on its duration.
  • The encounter is in its final 20 seconds, ensuring Power Infusion is utilized before the fight ends.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • Power Infusion is not already active on them.
  • The Mage activates their major cooldown Icy Veins.
  • The Mage has the Freezing Winds buff from the Cold Front talent.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • Their Xuen, the White Tiger is active, and the raid’s Bloodlust effect is not active.
  • Their Xuen, the White Tiger is active during Bloodlust, and their Strike of the Windlord is off cooldown and ready to be used.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • The paladin has Avenging Wrath active.
  • The paladin has Crusade active.
  • The target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • Voidform is active and Power Infusion is not active,
  • Dark Ascension is active and Power Infusion is not active,
  • or they have the TWW 4-piece set bonus active and Power Infusion is not active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • They have an active Deathmark debuff on their target to amplify damage during this high-impact cooldown window.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • The Subtlety Rogue has Shadow Dance active during their rotation.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • They are actively channeling Ascendance to amplify its damage window.
  • Their Ascendance cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining, allowing proactive use during other high-priority phases.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • They activate Ascendance OR summon Feral Spirit wolves OR trigger Doom Winds
  • There are 20 seconds or less remaining in a 2-minute window during boss encounters
  • Their major cooldowns won’t be available again for at least 2 minutes
  • They haven’t selected Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds talents (generic priority)
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • Their Dark Soul: Misery or other major damage cooldowns are active to amplify burst phases.
  • They are executing a pre-planned burst window during high-priority target encounters or critical fight mechanics.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • Their Demonic Tyrant summon is imminent, and their imps are about to despawn within the next few seconds.
  • They have recently cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination to empower or summon imps before summoning the Demonic Tyrant.
  • They are preparing to summon the Demonic Tyrant and have fewer than 2 Soul Shards, ensuring optimal timing for cooldown alignment.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • The warlock’s Infernal is currently active and dealing damage.
  • The warlock does not have the Summon Infernal talent selected.
  • The encounter will end before the warlock can cast another Summon Infernal, but is still expected to last longer than Power Infusion’s full duration.
  • The encounter will end within 15 seconds of the next possible Summon Infernal cooldown.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • the target has Colossus Smash debuff and the fight will last 135 seconds or longer.
  • the Warrior is in Execute Phase (target ≤20% health) and has Avatar active.
  • the fight is in its final 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • The Fury Warrior’s Avatar has over 15 seconds remaining and the encounter duration is at least 135 seconds.
  • The Warrior is in the Execute phase (target below 20% health) with Avatar active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds or less.
